title: Dr. Carole Schoffstall Endowed Professorship in Nursing and Health Sciences Fund
description: To provide an endowed Professorship in the Helen and Arthur E. Johnson Beth-El College of Nursing and Health Sciences at the University of Colorado Colorado Springs.
marketingContent: To provide an endowed Professorship in the Helen and Arthur E. Johnson Beth-El College of Nursing and Health Sciences at the University of Colorado Colorado Springs.
